description: Try our easy to follow Easy Beef Casserole recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Easy Beef Casserole Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Serve scattered with parsley and lemon rind. Tip 1: Don't try and rush the browning of the meat, if there is too much meat in the pan it will stew in its own juice and not brown. Tip 2: This casserole can be frozen for up to 3 months, thawed overnight in the refrigerator. Tip 3: This casserole makes a great family pie filling. Spoon into a baking dish and top with pastry or mashed potato or sweet potato.
